snippet: Sgt. Kimberly D. Munley, who as a civilian police officer shot Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan during his 2009 rampage, confronted him in court on Friday.
abstract: Sgt Kimberly D Munley, civilian police officer who shot Maj Nidal Malik Hasan during his 2009 shooting rampage in Fort Hood, Tex, testifies in his murder trial.

byline.contributor: John Schwartz contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Sgt. Kimberly D. Munley, who as a civilian police officer shot Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan during his 2009 rampage, confronted him in court on Friday.

headline.main: Sergeant Who Confronted Fort Hood Gunman Faces Him in Court
headline.print_headline: Sergeant Who Confronted Fort Hood Gunman Faces Him in Court
